sentences.en: a degree of variability in the exchange rate
sentences.cn: 汇率的变化幅度

sentences.en: Abstract: : housing demand and housing adaptability, variability is not coordination problem of current our country city housing is very serious.
sentences.cn: 摘要： 当前我国城市住宅中居住需求与住宅适应性、可变性不相协调的问题十分突出。

sentences.en: Greater variability carries with it a greater likelihood of resistance to chemotherapy and immunotherapy.
sentences.cn: 较大的变异性带来了对化学疗法与免疫疗法更大的抗性能力.

sentences.en: He says that we've underestimated natural variability.
sentences.cn: 他说我们低估了自然的变异性。

sentences.en: In addition it offers new facilities for storing genetic variability.
sentences.cn: 此外,它为贮存遗传变性提供新的可能.

sentences.en: In our world, not only do we have variability, we've got unpredictability.
sentences.cn: 在我们的世界不仅有可变性，还有不可预见性。

sentences.en: It is almost the case that each X ray source exhibits its own brand of variability.
sentences.cn: 几乎每个x射线源都有自己的变化特点.

sentences.en: Operations and parameters variability—You can parameterize operations and parameters at the interface definition level.
sentences.cn: 操作和参数可变性——您可以在接口定义级别参数化操作和参数。

sentences.en: Some catalogs provide data on motions , variability, duplicity, etc.
sentences.cn: 有的星表还提供了运动, 是否变光以及双星 、 聚星等等的资料.

sentences.en: The problem of individual variability has always been difficult.
sentences.cn: 个体间的差异问题总是很难办.

sentences.en: The species that make up natural ecosystems usually display a wide range of genetic variability.
sentences.cn: 构成自然生态系统的生物种,通常表现有较大范围的遗传变异性.

sentences.en: There are many problems with rankings, especially the metrics used and the variability.
sentences.cn: 排名有很多问题，特别是排名所依据的指标和排名的可变性。

sentences.en: There is adequate variability in plants to breed for resistance to certain aphid vectors.
sentences.cn: 植物有充分的变异性可用于培育对一些蚜虫介体的抗性.

sentences.en: There is considerable variability in all the test scores.
sentences.cn: 所有这些考查成绩都有很大变化.

sentences.en: There's a great deal of variability between individuals.
sentences.cn: 人和人之间有很大的不同。

sentences.en: Therefore we need to provide variability in the data layer so we can store the nationality of the customer for one bank but not require it for the other.
sentences.cn: 因此，我们需要在数据层中提供可变性，以便能够为一家银行存储客户国籍，但另一家银行却不需要如此。

sentences.en: This energy uncertainty in turn appears as a variability in the apparent mass of the particle.
sentences.cn: 这种能量的不确定范围,又表现为粒子表观质量的可变性.

sentences.en: This favorable overall result conceals some variability.
sentences.cn: 这样一种有利的总的结果也包含着一些不确定的因素.

sentences.en: Through similar and supplementary action, polygenes can have important effects on total variability.
sentences.cn: 通过相同的和添加的作用, 多基因可以对总的变异起重大的影响.

sentences.en: We can provide more than enough genetic information to account for the variability in nature.
sentences.cn: 可提供的遗传信息对于解释自然界中的变异性来说已经绰绰有余.

words.tran_cn: 变量的；可变的；易变的，多变的；变异的，[生物] 畸变的
多变的；各式各样的；杂色的
[数] 变量；可变物，可变因素
变异；变化；不一致；分歧；[数] 方差
变化；[生物] 变异，变种
改变；使多样化（vary的过去式和过去分词形式）
[生物][数]可变性，变化性；变异性

trans.tran_cn: 变化性，易变，变化的倾向，变率
